name: Fluttering Friends
description:
Fluttering Friends is a bird-friending simulator with silly dialogue, adorable art, and fun tunes.  You're a shy little pigeon who's dropped into the city square looking for other birds to friend! Good luck out there!

  • Artist: Gem - @gemhunter178
  • Artist: Liz Jackson - @imlizjackson
  • Composer: Ray Demers - @raydee99
  • Programmer: Justin Almendral - @warspiteful
  • Writer: Jonathon "Jon Bic" Bickelhaupt - @AmIJonBic 
  • Writer: Steve Lausier
  • Writer: Jade Edwards- @jadegalexandria
